title: Global Client Partner - Insights & Measurement
content:
===== Responsibilities ===== 

Partnering with the STA team to grow our business with key Global Advertisers  within the automotive and CPG verticals

Defining standard Teads and learn learning agenda approach 
Setting up goals per vertical (meetings with CMI, learning agenda) and tracking progress

Establishing and developing relationships with Global media, CMI and brand teams within the Automotive and CPG verticals

Setting up of research learning agendas, coordinating their market roll out, reporting on progresses and delivering output to clients
Close partnering with Teads STA lead and Client side head of media to help build credibility across our wider relationship
Producing Thought leadership pieces for client presentations and representing Teads alongside Clients at industry events
Designing specific and innovative solutions to measure or improve our clients business KPIs
Spearheading client research activity globally, tracking investment and ROI
Building norms and guidelines at client and industry level and elevating successful case studies
Participating in QBR sessions, client workshops
 and actively participating in key Ateliers and designing the testing regime around them


 

Internal communication on learnings, best practices and successes
Relationship & reporting with key internal stakeholders: management, STA, sales, marketing , innovation, studio,data.
Representing Teads and speaking at industry events

===== Personal attributes =====

Ability to build a consultative and strategic relationship with advertisers at global level 
Needs to be a business driven individual, creative and innovative in their approach to insights and measurement.
Ability to work across departments and time zones, with a variety of different stakeholders. Strong interpersonal skills
Must be a strong storyteller with the ability to turn data in to meaningful analysis that address key hypotheses and business issues

 
===== Required skills ===== 

10 years’ experience in relevant roles e.g. research agency, other media vendor, research agencies
Strong understanding of digital media measurement and programmatic advertising space including a working knowledge of DSPs, DMPs, SSPs
Understanding of audience measurement and ad effectiveness principles and experience working with relevant vendors etc Nielsen, Comscore, Kantar…
Previous experience working on MMM
An understanding of attention measurement
A working understanding of how the erosion of cookies is creating challenges for digital measurement
Strong working knowledge of Excel and Powerpoint is a must with capabilities of running basic analytics functions and formulae
Experience of using BI platforms e.g. Tableau, Looker etc

===== ABOUT TEADS ======
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omnichannel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media.
As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies. For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers.
Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries.
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
